fields.name: AssignmentScopeValidation
fields.description: The option whether validate the exemption is at or under the assignment scope.

fields.name: Description
fields.description: The description of the policy exemption.

fields.name: DisplayName
fields.description: The display name of the policy exemption.

fields.name: ExemptionCategory
fields.description: The policy exemption category. Possible values are Waiver and Mitigated.

fields.name: ExpiresOn
fields.description: The expiration date and time (in UTC ISO 8601 format yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ) of the policy exemption.

fields.name: Metadata
fields.description: The policy exemption metadata. Metadata is an open ended object and is typically a collection of key value pairs.

fields.name: PolicyAssignmentId
fields.description: The ID of the policy assignment that is being exempted.

fields.name: PolicyDefinitionReferenceIds
fields.description: The policy definition reference ID list when the associated policy assignment is an assignment of a policy set definition.

fields.name: ResourceSelectors
fields.description: The resource selector list to filter policies by resource properties.
